event.title: registered an annualised GDP growth rate of 11.5 per cent over the seven fiscal years

data.event: The city registered an annualised GDP growth rate of 11.5 per cent over the seven fiscal years between 2001 and 2008.

event.title: was awarded "best city" by the Annual Survey of India's City-Systems (ASICS) in 2013

data.event: Surat was awarded "best city" by the Annual Survey of India's City-Systems (ASICS) in 2013.
